name: Mike

responses.introduction: Hi, have you seen my robot? It seems to have gone astray...
responses.Big Footprint: Those would fit me I think.
responses.Small Footprint: Sorry, bit too small for me.
responses.Glasses: Yes I do need glasses these days.
responses.Bag: I do have a bag with me yes
responses.Lipstick: Erm no I do not wear lipstick...
responses.Dark Hair: I would say my hair is dark yes.
responses.Erotic Novel: Ah, a fellow lover of 50 Spades of Hay! We should go for drinks sometime!
responses.Broken Mobile Phone: I'm afraid I can't help you there, friend.
responses.Car Keys: My car is the same make as those keys! I'm glad you have such an appreciation for them.

noneResponses: Sorry I have some marking to get on with.
I'm not sure why I should help you exactly.
